name: Command & Conquer: Kane's Revenge
description:
A mission pack that focuses on tactics rather than usual C&C basebuidling

   

OUR LEADER KANE LIVES IN DEATH.

In celebration of the release of COMMAND & CONQUER: REMASTERED COLLECTION, Kane has returned to exact vengeance upon the GDI scum that has desecrated the Temple of Nod at Sarajevo. 

Set after the events of the GDI victory on Tiberian Dawn, Kane, who staged his fake death, has started an underground operation to crush GDI oppression and take back his control over the world. 

YOU are one of Kane's loyal insurgents that will be up to any task that Kane asks for. Lead the insurrection against the GDI that will spread the word of Kane to the whole planet. 

PEACE THROUGH POWER.
